mapper.select: select id, division_account_id, ref_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_division_account_battery_membercard where id = #{id}
select ref_id from t_division_account_battery_membercard where division_account_id = #{id}
select id, division_account_id, ref_id, tenant_id, type, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_division_account_battery_membercard where division_account_id = #{id}

select division_account_id from t_division_account_battery_membercard dab left join t_division_account_config dac on dac.id=dab.division_account_id where ref_id = #{refId} and dac.status=0 and dac.del_flag=0 order by dab.id limit 1

select dab.ref_id from t_division_account_config dac left join t_division_account_battery_membercard dab on dac.id=dab.division_account_id where dac.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and dac.status=0 and dac.del_flag=0
select id, division_account_id, ref_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_division_account_battery_membercard limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_division_account_battery_membercard(division_account_id, ref_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{divisionAccountId}, #{refId}, #{tenantId}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_division_account_battery_membercard(division_account_id, ref_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.divisionAccountId}, #{item.refId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime})

insert into t_division_account_battery_membercard(division_account_id, ref_id, tenant_id, type, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.divisionAccountId}, #{item.refId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.type}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_division_account_battery_membercard
division_account_id = #{divisionAccountId},
ref_id = #{refId},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
